::DrillBit::

Looks up, at the explosian far off.
"Hmmm. Looks like the explosian wasn't that big after all, Bludgeon." He
opened a link.
"StarScream, Phobia, you read?" He switched channels.
"We need fliers over here." He closes the link.
"Kit, you want to go to that cave, Atma found?"
